text: Mee ne wanga gi digaula nnaganoho aanei i muli nadau lloomoi i Egypt, gei digaula nogo i di gowaa baba bahi i dua di Monowai Jordan, i di baahi e huli adu gi di waahale o Beth Peor, deenei di gowaa ne wanga nnaganoho aanei gi digaula. Deenei la nogo i lodo di gowaa di king digau Amor go Sihon, dela nogo dagi i di waahale o Heshbon. Moses mo digau Israel gu hagamagedaa a mee i di nadau lloomoi i Egypt.
